TextBody:
Hello Dominik,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Support. Please note that I will be working on this ticket for you related to permissions in PingCastle to scan Azure AD. I will get back to you with an update shortly.

Kind Regards,

Shaheryar Ali
Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Corporation
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NeL6w:ref
Subject: PingCastle Cloud for Azure AD (Entra ID)    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NeL6w:ref ]

TextBody:
Dominik - I would suggest you to wait for the patch that is scheduled to be rolled out over the next week or 2. We are currently using the depecated MSOnline API, AzureAD APIs, Graph and some other less obvious ones. The permissions you mentioned are just the graph API ones and hence, you cannot delegate accesses to the others any longer. It is recommended to just run an interactive scan until we complete these migrations.

The build in the next couple of weeks will migrate the provisioning API (MSOnline) to graph.

Please let me know if this helps. Moreover, you can visit the following link to get more context of it: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft-entra-blog/action-required-msonline-and-azuread-powershell-retirement---2025-info-and-resou/4364991
If you have any follow up questions, please feel free to reach out. Thanks!

Kind Regards,

Shaheryar Ali
Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Corporation
